properties.media:imagetext:
news for trans-world travelers!
now visit
PARIS &
LONDON*
for the price
of a Paris
ticket alone!
Effective July 18, Trans World
Airline offers you one-way fare
U.S.A. — Paris—London for the
SAME amount as one-way fare*
from the U.S.A. to Paris! This,
plus the added convenience of
Paris stop-over privileges, means
you can visit BOTH these world-
famous cities at no additional
fare charges.
And there's no more ideal time than
late summer for
your dreamed-of
international vacation (or business
trip)
• . . the old-world charm of
London
and Paris beckons
• the
hotels and resorts less crowded
the atmosphere unhurried
• even
the weather is in tune.
And with
TWA round-trip space now available,
it's easier to get there!
*U.S.A. to Paris via TWA; Paris to London
via connecting airline.
* 46 TWA Atlantic crossings weekly
... 23 each way!

NOW TWA Constellation service for
Philadelphia & Pittsburgh
Direct through-plane service daily
to and from both coasts ... and
on to Europe, Africa and Asia!
TWA CONSTELLATION
express routes in the U. S.
Now closer than ever before!
New, improved 300 MPH TWA Constellation service now links these
cities in a span of speed across the nation and provides the utmost
in service and comfort aloft - flying at smooth "over-weather"
alti-
tudes, in pressurized cabins for low-level comfort - with two hostesses
to make your air journey doubly enjoyable.
(See schedules in this timetable)

news for trans-world travelers!
now visit
PARIS &
LONDON*
for the price
of a Paris
ticket alone!
Effective July 18, Trans World
Airline offers you one-way fare
U.S.A. — Paris—London for the
SAME amount as one-way fare*
from the U.S.A. to Paris! This,
plus the added convenience of
Paris stop-over privileges, means

famous cities at no additional

And there's no more ideal time than

• . . the old-world charm of

And with

*U.S.A. to Paris via TWA; Paris to London

... 23 each way!

FLY BOTH WAYS BY WORLD-PROVED
TWA SKYLINERS
When you go, fly by dependable
4-engined TWA Skyliner with
veteran crews seasoned by
millions of miles of trans-world
experience. During the first four
months of this year, Trans World
Airline carried
18,925 interna-
tional passengers.

00
Did you know ...
that YOUR TRAVEL AGENT does a lot more than just get
your TWA reservations going and coming? He'll help you
plan complete tours abroad or here at home.
... that he'll make it easy for you to get the necessary visas,
passports, etc.. help you with hotel accommodations.
show you how really easy it is to go abroad via TWA?
...that you don't have to pay your travel agent
for these valuable services? You get his expert
advice and help completely without charge.
...that it's smart to call your travel agent first thing when-
ever you're planning a trip so he'll have widest choice of
TWA flights? Or, if you prefer, call your local TWA office.
